snippet: As Republicans try to make it harder to qualify to vote, Democrats are pushing to make it easier to register to vote in states they control, especially California.
abstract: Democrats have begun to push to make it easier to register to vote in states they control, particularly in California, even as Republicans have moved to enact tougher qualifications for voting in states around the country.
lead_paragraph: As Republicans try to make it harder to qualify to vote, Democrats are pushing to make it easier to register to vote in states they control, especially California.

headline.seo: In Face of Voter ID Laws, Democrats Push to Expand Ballot Access
headline.main: Easier Access to Ballot Is Pushed by Democrats
headline.print_headline: Easier Access to Ballot Is Pushed by Democrats
